pages.text: You have come a long way and nothing could stop you. Except for the few times in Ocean Temples with mining fatigue, slowness, mining underwater, in the air and other adverse conditions...$(br)$(italic)Hm, written out like this, that was a bit more than expected$().

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Prevents mining speed slowdowns (on tools) or movement slowdowns (on chestplates).$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br)Applicable to mining tools and chestplates.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with Inexorable by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.
